text: The Tattooist is a 2007 New Zealand Dutch Singaporean horror movie directed by Peter Burger and starring Jason Behr, Michael Hurst, Timothy Balme, David Fane, Nathaniel Lees, Caroline Cheong, Matthew Ridge, Robbie Magasiva. ==Other websites== * * Category:2007 horror movies Category:New Zealand horror movies Category:Dutch horror movies Category:Singaporean movies Category:Movies set in New Zealand
title: The Tattooist
